pageProps.content:
### About me

Hey, I'm Andrey.

I have been working as a software engineer since 2005.

I'm mostly interested in backend development and DevOps culture.

### My contacts

### About the blog
This blog is written in Obsidian and the pages are rendered with Next.js.
